description: Umwe afata undi nk'inshuti ye magara
title: Papa yambereye inshuti
content:
Chantal Mukandayisenga w’imyaka 18 y’ amavuko yiga mu mwaka wa gatatu w’amashuri yisumbuye kuri Groupe Scolaire Saint Albert mu Karere ka Kamonyi. Ni umwana wa gatatu mu muryango w’abana batandatu, bakaba batuye mu Mudugudu wa Ruhaha muri ako karere. Mu by’ukuri Chantal aracyari muto, ariko afite umuntu mukuru w’ inshuti idasanzwe, uwo ni papa we, Desibarde Habingabwa. Umubano wabo urenze kuba umwe ari papa undi akaba umukobwa we, ahubwo umwe afata undi nk’inshuti magara, kandi buri umwe agirira akamaro undi.

Hari ikintu kidasanzwe Desibarde yakoreye Chantal kugirango abe umukobwa wihagazeho kandi ushoboye: yamufashije gutangira ubworozi bw’amatungo magufi amuha ikibwana cy’ingurube. Uretse kuba ibi bifasha Chantal kwigurira icyo akeneye, byanamufashije kugira ishyaka no kwiyizera bizamufasha gutegura ejo hazaza he. 

Chantal yagize ati: “Intego yanjye ni ugushyiramo imbaraga nkarangiza amashuri hanyuma nkafasha umuryango wanjye nk’uko nabo bamfashije. Sinshobora kwitesha aya mahirwe nagize”.

Ku rundi ruhande Desibarde avuga ko atewe ishema n’umukobwa we kandi yishimira cyane umubano mwiza bafitanye. Ati: “Nshimishwa cyane n’ukuntu Chantal akunda ishuri ndetse akananyubaha. Akunda kunyisanzuraho kandi akambwira byose. Ambwira ibimushimishije ndetse n’ibimubangamiye. Icyizere angirira gituma mparanira kumwereka ko nanjye mwizera kandi ko mukunda. Namuhaye rimwe mu matungo yanjye kugirango abashe kugira ibyo yifasha nko kwigurira imyenda myiza, amavuta yo kwisiga n’ibindi bikenerwa n’abangavu”.

Desibarde ashishikariza ababyeyi gutekereza ku mubano bagirana n’abakobwa babo. Abagira inama yo kujya baganira n’abakobwa babo, bakabagira inama ku bibazo bahura nabyo mu buzima bwa buri munsi. Yemera kandi ko ababyeyi bakwiriye kwita ku burezi bw’abana babo.
